Reviews.Title: Just Drive To an AT&T; store, because your going to have to anyway
Reviews.Author: Inactivatable DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Content: I got the card in the mail, in what seemed like a junk mail envelope (It was almost thrown away by someone i live with), and after trying to activate the card online found out it failed and said the SIM number did not exist, so i called AT&T; and after a long wait time it still failed.I then talked to an agent explained the situation and he told me the card was deactivated and could not be activated, he also told me that SIM cards should not be purchased from retailers online and to drive down to the store and pick up a FREE! SIM card. So long story short your going to have to drive to an AT&T; store anyway so don't waste the time and money like i did. ( I live 2 hours from the nearest AT&T; store :/) the other reviews here are about people having to drive to the store anyway and they seem happy about it, i don't understand why just go to the store and tell them Customer service said you can pick up a free SIM card and they will hand you one and activate it there for FREE!, please excuse and spelling and grammar mistakes, i didnt really feel like posting this review i figured i would just save someone else the trouble.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is
Reviews.Author: Benjax
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom who is visiting from her home country.  Easy to set-up.  Works fine.  Just access ATT gophone site.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work!
Reviews.Author: Uriel Lopez
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this. It's like from 3 years ago. There better to get at an at&t; store! Not expensive and worth it

Reviews.Title: Beat the high cost of cewll phones
Reviews.Author: frankie
Reviews.Content: I buy refurbished and unlocked cell phones rather than pay too much for hte usual offers that require contracts. I save money both ways and own the phone...if I am not happy with my provider I can just switch to another company, in this case AT&T.; Activation is easy as pie online and costs nothing.

Reviews.Title: great sim card
Reviews.Author: chevy
Reviews.Content: it came before the scheduled date shipped fast had no problems with it I inserted my card and activated it online it only took 10 mins and my sim card was in use

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Paulo da Silva
Reviews.Content: Really good product and company.I strongly recommend this company to foreigners, because it offers a good international calling plan

Reviews.Title: Works very good.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia A. Anderson
Reviews.Content: AT&T; Customer Service told me I could not get a new sim card and that I HAD to get the one that was in the phone.  He could not understand that the cell phone was in over 50 ft of water in the middle of a lake.  AT&T; Customer service failedme.

Reviews.Title: worked great in  samsung 3g phone ( att) ( not unblocked.
Reviews.Author: LA lady "amazon woman"
Reviews.Content: this worked fine,but its limited to only 3g and its the biggerversion of sim card.it does or did not get accepted in smartphone ( Samsung)I needed it cause the stupid att rep sent me a "mini or microsize sim..and I literally was stuck ( they wanted $12 or goto the store ( for 2 hours) to buy and activate the stupid simit was easy with the att  TOGOPLANI cannot speak for any other plan.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: It Works and thats all i need from something this simple.i put it inti my LG phone and then went to the website to activate it

Reviews.Title: Imposssible to activate if not in cell phone coverage
Reviews.Author: James S. Sarapata
Reviews.Content: First I tried to activate online but the at&t; website couldn't recognize my phone model ( a Dell), or my location. I spent several hours on the phone with at&t; customer service and after being cut off once they finally told me that they couldn't do it and I would have to visit an at&t; store which is a hundred miles away . My $2.50 sim purchase will end up costing more than the phone.

Reviews.Title: used it just to get past activation screen on iphone 3GS
Reviews.Author: JediMind88
Reviews.Content: my iPhone 3GS would not let me go to the home screen without geting a sim card in it so I just ordered this and popped it in the phone now I can use it like an ipod or even a future phone if I want

Reviews.Title: ATT Sim Card
Reviews.Author: MigNRiz
Reviews.Content: It worked well, does exactly what it's supposed to do. It stored my data and I can take it to any phone. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Useful...
Reviews.Author: Stealth
Reviews.Content: The vendor was great. Very responsive customer support. ATT has a Byzantine web-site. Difficult to load the card with the amount I wanted, got deducted for web use without signing up for it. Be careful!

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel  Pabon
Reviews.Content: thanks for the article works great thanks for sending vyu ñu harto Pío olí Gt km ñu lo re u

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: HTWN
Reviews.Content: Was skeptical on ordering the sim card. But I took a chance the att store is far.I read some reviews and even actually watched videos.My Iphone 3 has been out of service since June...And it had the password to get in  it..So when the att sim unactivated card arrived in 4 days. I put it in and went to att website to go phone and activated it on line working every since they supplied me with a new number and  everything..You have 29 days to add money to account or it will deactivate...you can also take your phone number with you the instructions on line.It is simple and easy...Good luck..I even go to wifi / mc donalds and wifi areas works excellent.

Reviews.Title: SIM Card
Reviews.Author: DisavowedKing
Reviews.Content: It's a sim card. You put it in your phone and it allows you to connect to the network to make and receive phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Uh... Yep
Reviews.Author: K. Davison "Certified Journeyman Carpenter"
Reviews.Content: What is there to say... It's an unactivated sim card. It works like it should.Pop it in and open your Iphone.

Reviews.Title: It's a good buy
Reviews.Author: peaceful
Reviews.Content: I got just what I wanted when I wanted it. Thanks for sending this product as expected. You were perfect.

Reviews.Title: Arrived Fast Activated Easily
Reviews.Author: T. Cozier "TC"
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping and easy activation. Used it on an unlocked international phone for a prepaid Go Phone account. Used CallingMart to add credit to it. What more can I say...it works!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Karin Gandy
Reviews.Content: I REALLY LOVE  THIS  SIM CARD, IT HAS  COME IN HANDY JUST  WHEN I NEEDED IT, AMZON HAS SEVERAL GREAT PRODUCTS, AND YES, THIS IS  ONE  OF  THEM, SO GLAD TO BE A AMAZON CUSTOMER.

Reviews.Title: at&t; sim card
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: i was glad to find this because my niece needed a new sim card for her phone and at&t; charges too much for one or you have to buy a cheap pre-paid phone just to get the card and that's a waste of money and a phone that is not needed. thank you for having an alternative..

Reviews.Title: Fast delivering
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: I ordered it by December 26th 2012 and I got it by December 31st! My New Year's Eve Gift! I am very pleased with it.! All you gotta do is google att activations and click on gophone. Mine works because I indeed have a gophone phone the cheapest one so the imei I put in was that one. But I use the sim card on an unlocked phone from another carrier and Yes! I have 4G! Not like tmobile and simple mobile that runs EDGE! cuz they are still on the 17000mhz frequency (GMS/EDGE) while the 4G AND 3G is UMTS : 19000 MHZ at least for my phone!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: R. Harris "Marlie's Mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought is for my daughter's new iPhone. I wanted to activate it to use it as an iPod touch. The SIM card worked perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: perfectlythick1
Reviews.Content: Although I had to return the cards they came quickly and promptly. FYI, unless you already have an account with AT&T; there is no need to buy a sim card. They are free at the store, just go ask for them. You will need to activate it at the store or else the cards are useless

Reviews.Title: waist of time and money.
Reviews.Author: William E. Baldwin
Reviews.Content: Go to the AT$T store and they will give you one for FREE! This is a total rip off! Buttheads

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: Scott S.
Reviews.Content: Waste of money. Didn't work. Could not activate it. Took it to AT&T;, they said "it was old".Stay away from it.

Reviews.Title: Unactivated AT&T; Sim Card
Reviews.Author: Dexter
Reviews.Content: Life is like a cellphoneWheneverYou insert theSim card of a smile ,A beautiful day isActivated …Good morning&Keep smilingHere is the sim card to activate your beautiful day!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Carlocristian
Reviews.Content: OK, was for a specific proposel, and works like i want and expect for itNo more comments about it

Reviews.Title: The SIM card worked fine after activation
Reviews.Author: John Thompson
Reviews.Content: I went to the local AT&T; shop and requested activation. The card worked fine and have been using it ever since.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Lalos
Reviews.Content: It works great if u want to keep it unactivated or avtivated eathier one the card is amazing defiantly should buy
